Install Notes for a fresh install.

1. Get a Battle.net Account, download the Starcraft 2 Installer from the Website.
2. Download this
3. Install Starcraft 2
4. Unpack this release, update to 1.4.0
5. Copy the crack content to the install directory.
6. Run sc2_copy.exe
7. Run the keytro.exe when you see the text on the wheel to your left change its done, press ESC and start the game.

Remember, if you have UAC activated, always start with Admin Rights
Press F2 Until it changes that is.

How to Install Properly:

1: Unplug/Disable Internet Connection

2: Install SC2 (DO NOT INSTALL/RUN SC2_COPY OR KEYTRO UNTIL STEP 5!) 

3: Extract Starcraft II Wings Of Liberty v1.4.0 Update-RazorDOX into your game directory eg: C:Program Files (x86)StarCraft II

4: Run sc2-1.4.0-enGB (THIS MAY TAKE A WHILE DO NOT CLOSE UNTIL ITS FINISHED)

5: Run SC2_Copy

6: Run Keytro and wait until you see the gear with Razor1911

7: Now do not run Starcraft II.exe instead go to Support folder and run SC2Switcher.exe

8: Play as guest
